ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Conductive/Mixed Hearing Loss (Left Ear)
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: History of left stapedectomy 10 years ago with prosthesis extrusion; audiogram reveals conductive/mixed loss with significant air-bone gaps.

ranked_differential_diagnosis.label: Tinnitus (Left Ear)
ranked_differential_diagnosis.rationale_short: Patient reports constant low-level ringing in the left ear starting immediately after surgery.

ordered_list.rationale_short: To assess hearing thresholds and air-bone gaps given the history of stapedectomy.
To evaluate speech reception thresholds and word recognition abilities.
To assess middle ear status (though not measured at this appointment).

expected_interpretations_by_visit.collective_interpretation: The right ear demonstrates normal hearing sensitivity. The left ear exhibits a moderate rising to mild conductive hearing loss in the low frequencies, transitioning to a mixed loss in the mid-to-high frequencies, with significant air-bone gaps. Speech audiometry is consistent with pure-tone findings, showing excellent word recognition bilaterally. Results are consistent with the history of unsuccessful stapedectomy and prosthesis extrusion.

tests.name: Pure-tone audiometry
tests.result_summary: Right ear: Normal hearing (0-10 dB HL). Left ear: Moderate rising to mild conductive loss (250-500 Hz), slight mixed loss (750-2000 Hz), sloping to mild-to-moderately severe (3000-6000 Hz). Significant air-bone gaps present.

tests.name: Speech audiometry
tests.result_summary: Right ear: SRT 3 dB, WRS 96%. Left ear: SRT 27 dB, WRS 92%. Consistent with pure-tone averages.

proposed_items: Continue using amplification in the left ear.
counseling_actions: Discuss the stability of hearing sensitivity over the past 10 years.
Explain the conductive and mixed nature of the hearing loss related to the surgical history.
Counsel on the importance of hearing protection to preserve remaining hearing.

escalation.rationale_short: Patient followed up with an otologist as scheduled.

expected_outcome: Patient followed up with an otologist as scheduled.
Recommendations were to return annually for testing to monitor stability of hearing sensitivity.
Advised to use hearing protection as needed.
